Annoying and toxic.
Fun first few hours, then it becomes boring.

Pros:
- Great idea for a game, is scary at first
- Many familiar characters
- Many perks and items

Cons:
- Gameplay is monotonous (hold mouse button, press space from time to time)
- Annoying and unfair: on average killer wins most trials in low rank, survivors win in high rank
- Extra toxic players
- If playing as survivor - be ready to die more than half of trials

BUYERS BEWARE! DO NOT BUY THIS GAME THINKING YOU'LL HAVE A FAIR CHANCE! 

TL;DR: Match making punishes new players.

The match making system is broken for any new players. I bought this game on sale for the October/Halloween sale with a friend and jumped into a game with little to no knowledge. Fair enough, i'll suck at the game because I'm a newb. But we were pitted up against people that were higher level then us, higher rank then us and had more perks unlocked. The fact that they pit new players with players familiar with this game already is unfair and discourages new players. Since you'll just be playing against people with more experience then you. While you're trying to figure out how to play and survive, you'll be getting killed over and over and over again. Since you lack knowledge of the game. Watching videos help but the learning curve doesn't matter since your character is lower level then anyone you'll play against. More perks for them and less perks for you means they already have an advantage over you. This game has its moments but for new players that are playing solo or with just a friend, DO NOT BUY IT!
YESSSS VERY ADDICTED AND HATED THIS GAME

For as much shit as people give this game, it is still at its core a good, well designed game. Granted some things in it are broken as all belief, but this often comes from connection based factors that are not an easy fix. As far as balance goes, steps are being made continually to make it as even as possible for both sides. My one complaint with the game is not even because of core gameplay. The ranking system as higher ranks are reached can seem unfair at times, an example of this is when playing killer in top ranks, a game that you play perfectly that just goes by really fast is worth less is most aspects then an alright game that drags on. This is due to the point values for different things not taking into consideration the length of the game. This could also be said for survivors, if you repair all of the generators fast, and the killer was being looped by one person for the whole match, it can be almost impossible to gain rank that game even though you did what you had to do during that game well.

不解决开黑的问题，其它问题怎么搞都会有人流失。很多人玩这个游戏只是为了能和好友一块组队，像我在内当初入坑的原因就是跟好友可以4黑，现在组队开黑的功能烂的一批，拉我进坑的好友现在都不怎么玩了。制作组如果没本事修复开黑功能，那请麻烦把组队方式恢复成以前的状态，以前最起码还能玩，现在索性没法玩！！！！
但就游戏的可玩性来说还是值得一玩的。

На самом деле, игрушка не плохая, имеется хороший античит, что смешно но за все 3 часа игры, ни одного растения с 27 хромасомами не встретил. Игра показывает всю суть человеческого характера, ведь будучи в безопасности люди друзья, но как только где-то рядом маньяк и друг ранен, конечно многие просто свалят. Тимплей в игре на 4/5 ведь когда работа идёт в компании играть даже весело. И когда тебя повесят на крюк, есть большая надежда что тебя постараются снять. Храмает правдо оптимизация для столь старой игры, но на моём древнем ПК вроде норм на минималках))). Но игра заслуживает 4,5/5

Dead By Daylight is a great game! I played for (almost) 1500 hours at the time of writing this so it's a lot of fun to be fair. But after I hit 1000 hours it started to become a lot less fun because there's not enough variety. But if you're a horror fan like me then you'll definitely love this game regardless. The variety issue doesn't pop up really unless you play for a long time like I did. It's got tons of Horror Icons like leatherface, freddy krueger, michael myers and more :))
